Login

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-log-in', templateUrl: './log-in.component.html', styleUrls: ['./log-in.component.css'] }) export class LogInComponent { email: string = ""; password: string = ""; emisor:any; emisores = [ { Codigo: "001", NombreEmisor: "Emisor1"}, { } ] constructor() { } login() { console.log(this.email); console.log(this.password); } seleccionar(){ } }
